titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/9/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio. Authorizes appropriations.
